conclusion: Analysis of Two Toy Cars Moving Toward Each Other
Two toy cars (A and B) moving and colliding on a green surface with colored blocks and a ball
Car A is light-colored and on the left; Car B is green and on the right; moving toward each other
Discrepancy noted in question about direction of movement
Image 1: Car A on left, Car B on right, colored blocks and ball in center
Image 2: Cars colliding near center, colored blocks disturbed
Image 3: Car A on right, Car B on left, blocks further scattered
Cars A and B were moving toward each other from opposite sides
Cars collided near the center of the green surface
After collision, cars continued moving in altered directions
Car A ends up on the right, Car B on the left, suggesting an elastic collision
Final positions: Car A on right, Car B on left, swapped positions
